mapper.select: SELECT a.mymenu_code , a.mymenu_name , a.mymenu_order , a.use_yn , a.mymenu_code as row_id /* PK, AUIGrid key row setting */ FROM SYS0059M a WHERE a.crt_user_id = #{userId} AND (UPPER(a.mymenu_code) LIKE UPPER(#{mymenuCode}) || '%' OR UPPER(a.mymenu_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{mymenuCode}) || '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys0059m ( mymenu_code, mymenu_name, mymenu_order, use_yn, crt_user_id, crt_dt, upd_user_id, upd_dt ) VALUES ( #{mymenuCode}, #{mymenuName}, #{mymenuOrder}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT a.mymenu_code , d.mymenu_name , a.menu_code , b.menu_name , a.pgm_ord , b.pgm_code , c.pgm_name , a.mymenu_code||a.menu_code as row_id /* PK, AUIGrid key row setting */ FROM SYS0060D a , SYS0051M b , SYS0050M c , SYS0059M d WHERE a.menu_code = b.menu_code AND b.pgm_code = c.pgm_code AND a.mymenu_code = d.mymenu_code AND a.mymenu_code = #{mymenuCode}
